channel.title: YouTube Media Server
channel.description:
I plan to make a server showing trailers for games and mods and the number 1 mod I want to implement to show this to people is BM. :freeman: The server is in GMod and will be used for fun but sometimes I will play videos for people to see.
Allow my Test.
[url=https://www.xfire.com/video/14274e/][img]https://video.xfire.com/14274e-4.jpg[/img][/url]
Tell me what you think and if I should continue with this.
(Also if this forum is not right for this post please feel free to move it.)

item.title: YouTube Media Server
item.dc:creator: The_Assassin47
item.description:
Hey PharCry. Its cool that you can do that, but what makes this better than a website? If people can use youtube…

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Media Server
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Raminator:

Shift+tab is even more useful, you don’t have to minimise it or anything. Steam Community’s in-game browser is awesome.

Indeed. Although I can’t help but think it could be more awesome, like being able to use keyboard shortcuts for copy and paste in it.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Media Server
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
I get the kind that my parents pay for.

EDIT: As for the server… Yep. Fucking pretty failed. I think I got 3 people who liked it. Well sounded like a cool idea in my head. Guess I now need to hang my head in shame… :meh:

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Media Server
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
Mangled*:

When it boils down to it, really it’s a waste of money/time/effort.

As far as I know I am not spending any money. I built the lua’s myself. As for time and effort, maybe. However I have it done. I may just try it anyway to see if it works.

Right now my Gmod server has people in it (Around 15). I am gonna now give it a run. Be back with results.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Media Server
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
When it boils down to it, really it’s a waste of money/time/effort. It’s not a terrible idea but it lacks usefulness. People don’t play Gmod to watch videos, they play Gmod to build stuff or be assholes.

On the other hand, if you could use that to play Gmod tutorial videos perhaps it would be much more useful. But alt+tab makes it kind of redundant. There’s also no guarantee that people will use or appreciate it at all.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Media Server
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
I thought It could be cool and with the amount of slots I can handle over here I can show many people videos they wouldn’t normally see. However if it really sounds like a dumb idea then I don’t really want to continue with it.

Duck:

I think its pretty cool idea

Thanks.

Read full topic
